pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants, Shoes plus socks. Follow manufacturer’s instructions for cleaning/maintaining PPE (Personal Protective Equipment). Keep and wash PPE separately from other laundry.

Active_Ingredients.name: Glyphosate, N-(phosphonomethyl)glycine (isopropylamine salt)
Active_Ingredients.mode_Of_Action: The active ingredient in this product inhibits an enzyme found only in plants that is essential to formation of specific amino acids.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling. DOMESTIC ANIMALS: This product is considered to be relatively nontoxic to dogs and other domestic animals; however, ingestion of this product or large amounts of freshly sprayed vegetation may result in temporary gastrointestinal irritation (vomiting, diarrhea, colic, etc.). If such symptoms are observed, provide the animal with plenty of fluids to prevent dehydration. Call a veterinarian if symptoms persist for more than 24 hours.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment. For non-emergency exposure information on this product, call 1-888-347-6732 (7 days/week, 24-hr). For medical emergencies, dial 911.
